allMessagesSentAreRecorded: All messages sent to AI Chat are recorded.
anythingPersonalCanNotBeSubmitted: In order to protect your privacy, anything considered personal information (name, phone number, address, etc.) should not be submitted to AI chat.
inappropriateMessagesAreFlagged: Inappropriate messages will be flagged and your teacher will be notified.
inappropriateUserMessage: This message has been flagged as inappropriate.
tooPersonalUserMessage: This message has been flagged as too personal.
